quotes.text: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.text: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.text: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing. That’s why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
